title: Buyer - Purchasing
status: Full Time, 40 hours per week (year round, 239 day calendar)EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCEHigh School Diploma required.  Bachelor’s degree involving major coursework in business, supply chain, finance or related area preferred.  A combination of education and experience is acceptable.Experience with the following procurement tools: Quotes, invitation for bid (IFB), request for proposal (RFP) to ensure flow of commodities, services and construction to the District.The salary for this position is assigned to Level 09 of the SC Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkSC Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):Buyer.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version
